overview: When Valerie Cohen finally meets a guy who isn't "a total douche," her friends try to help her overcome a sexual tick that's been plaguing her recent romantic endeavors: every time she has an orgasm, she says "I love you." Val soon learns that her sexual tick is the least of her intimacy issues.
tagline: Scaring men away. One orgasm at a time.
title: Oh Baby, I Love You!
